actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to provide increased civil fines and criminal penalties for violations of the Motor Carrier Safety Regulations, to extend the application of civil fines to all violations of the Motor Carrier Safety Regulations.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to increase the penalties for violations of motor carrier safety regulations promulgated by the Secretary of Transportation and to extend the application of civil fines to violations of any such regulations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to provide increased civil fines and criminal penalties for violations of the Motor Carrier Safety Regulations, to extend the application of civil fines to all violations of the Motor Carrier Safety Regulations.
